long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ModernLoop is a productivity tool for recruiting co-ordinators. It integrates with Application tracking systems like Greenhouse, Lever, Ashby or Workday. As part of this extension ModernLoop gives an option to user to open Greenhouse, Lever, Ashby, SmartRecruiters or Workday candidate profile in ModernLoop in a new tab.
